## Summary

- What changed?
- Why was this change needed?

## Type of Change

- [ ] Add new API entries
- [ ] Fix broken links
- [ ] Improve docs/README formatting
- [ ] Workflow/automation update
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## API Changes (if applicable)

For every new API added, confirm:

- [ ] API is free or has a usable free tier
- [ ] API has public documentation
- [ ] API link is reachable
- [ ] API is placed in the correct category
- [ ] Entry follows the table format

## Checklist

- [ ] I searched the README to avoid duplicates
- [ ] I verified markdown formatting is correct
- [ ] I ran `python scripts/check_links.py` locally (or explain why not)
- [ ] I updated docs generation inputs when needed
- [ ] I read and followed `CONTRIBUTING.md`
- [ ] My changes do not include unrelated modifications

## Notes for Reviewers

Add anything important reviewers should know (edge cases, assumptions, follow-ups).
